ok
  sooooooo
  what the heck?
  you guys are using radio i get? whats that mean? lol
  and what do you do with the foreign languge? to get the evp how?
  HA HA HA
  IN other words i have no clue what you guys are doing and how
  does ne1 have the time to exlain from the beging the whole process?
   
  amy

Jody Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote:
            This is what I used to get the last evp I sent through. :)
   
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jody Cupp 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 6:35 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] woohoo perfect signal again
  

      Frank,
  your post reminded me of that method.  I like to use a broadcast from internet radio.
   
  Notice the man says "you need stop coming in and out like that" Bran was coming in and out of the house while I was recording.  Then the next voice is not even on the broadcast.  he says "perfect signal again" woo hoo!
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Sumption Frank 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 5:59 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Here's a voice from the 5th.
  

        
   This is one voice that was trying to assert my identity. This was gotten by using a foreign  language as the raw audio in 2002. The foreign language method is tuning in a non English station on short wave, I like French, German, and even Chinese. Then I announce I�m doing an EVP recording and record using the built in mic on a cassette deck.  
  
   Frank
